summary: Verified P0 and P1 Gamma Designer bug fixes. Backend: 7/7 tests passed. Frontend: SWR-based labels working correctly (FAIR MATCH for SWR 1.56, not 'PERFECT MATCH').
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both P0 and P1 Gamma Designer bugs have been verified as fixed. P0: Frontend uses swr_at_null for labels (EXCELLENT/GOOD/FAIR/POOR MATCH), not 'PERFECT MATCH'. P1: 3-element Yagi now returns SWR=1.0 from /api/gamma-designer.

P0_swr_labels.description: Gamma Designer UI was showing 'PERFECT MATCH' for high SWR values like 3.21
P0_swr_labels.verification: Frontend now shows SWR-based labels: EXCELLENT (<=1.1), GOOD (<=1.5), FAIR (<=2.0), POOR (>2.0)
P0_swr_labels.tested_scenario: 2-element Yagi with SWR 1.56 shows 'FAIR MATCH' - CORRECT

P1_3element_swr.description: 3-element Yagi was getting suboptimal SWR 1.21 from the Gamma Designer, should achieve SWR 1.0
P1_3element_swr.verification: curl POST /api/gamma-designer with num_elements=3 returns swr_at_null=1.0
P1_3element_swr.tested_scenario: 3-element Yagi now achieves SWR=1.0, eligible for 'EXCELLENT MATCH' label

gamma_designer_modal.apply_button: Uses null_reachable for color (green if true, orange if false) - NOT for label
